item.title: Small error - Help please
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Alright it all started when i added this under… else if(HasArrows){

else if(HasArrows){
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827) {
dbow = true;
dbow timer = 2;
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 60, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 40, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
//actionAmount++;
//setAnimation(playerSEA);
DeleteArrow();
createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, arrowgfx(), 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4214 && playerEquipmentN[playerArrows] != 0)
ItemHandler.addItem(playerEquipment[playerArrows], EnemyX, EnemyY, 1, playerId, false);
setAnimation(426);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
AttackingOn2.KillerId = playerId+10;
AttackingOn2.inCombat();
inCombat();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
AttackingOn2.setAnimation(GetBlockAnim(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));
LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay
if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) {
hitDiff = EnemyHP;
}
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff].hitDiff = hitDiff;
//PkingDelay = wepdelay;
}

And i got this error…

client.java:4654: 'else' without 'if'
                              } else {
1 error
Files Compile Successfully
Press any key to continue . . .

[size=10pt]EDIT:[/size]
This is where the error is…

else if(UseBow && duelRule[0]) {
      sendMessage("Ranged has been disabled in this duel");
    }
   }
}
return true;
} else {
sendMessage("This player is not in the duel");
ResetAttack();
}
}
}
return false;
}

Any ideas?
